DescriptionData.Title: AJs Zebra Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Funky socks with a Zebra print. These patterned socks come in bright lime green with black zebra stripes. They have a ribbed top band and heel for a fitted look. These socks come to approximately mid-calf.
Zebra socks are made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (adult small, sock size 9 - 11). They are very stretchy.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Sized to fit most adults (adult small, sock size 9-11)
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
